import java.util.Scanner;

public class JavaApplication376 {

public static void main(String[] args) {
    Scanner sc= new Scanner(System.in);
    String s = sc.nextLine();
    while(!s.isEmpty()){
        //System.out.println(line);
        String[] ss= s.split(" ");
        String toLowerCase = ss[0].toLowerCase();
        String toLowerCase1 = ss[1].toLowerCase();
        int[] a = new int[26];int[] b= new int[26];
        for(int i=0;i<toLowerCase.length();i++){
            a[toLowerCase.charAt(i)-'a']++;
        }
        for(int i=0;i<toLowerCase1.length();i++){
            b[toLowerCase1.charAt(i)-'a']++;
        }
        boolean c= true;
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++) if(a[i]!=b[i]) c= false;
        if(c) System.out.println("PASS");
        else System.out.println("FAIL");
        s = sc.nextLine();
    }
}

}
